channel.title: Need help with server
channel.description: i need help coding and the whole 9 yards making a server i know it take 2 ppl to make a server and im having luck so far i just need some1 with me who knows what there doin let me know please contact me on my aim Blacknite1770 blaise

item.title: Need help with server
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“Hotmailer, post:4, topic:326345”]Lol, i did it the easy way.
Anything i wanted too change on the server…
I would just go to client.java and search for it…
Or go into the folder’s search bar and type it there…

@topic/ It’s not allowed here.[/quote]
Yeah i did the exact same way
and:
-Follow some tutorials
-Try using code makers who make a whole command for you…
-use old comments for new ones!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server

item.description:
@Ms_Kay wrote:

[quote=“blaise, post:1, topic:326345”]i need help coding and the whole 9 yards making a server i know it take 2 ppl to make a server and im having luck so far i just need some1 with me who knows what there doin let me know please
contact me on my aim Blacknite1770
blaise[/quote]

You know, you don’t always have to have a “Coder”. When I was a beginner, I went to the Java Website, and picked up off there. Perhaps you should try?
